attributes.name: Adult Beginner 2 & 3 - Thursday 5:45pm
attributes.description:
Please note: This class shares ice with the youth learn to skate session at the same time. The first 30 minute are generally a practice/warm-up while the second 30 minutes are the class time. First week of classes will begin from 5:45pm without the practice/warm-up.

PLEASE DO NOT ENROLL IN A CLASS NOT APPROPRIATE TO YOUR LEVEL!

The adult curriculum is designed for beginning, intermediate and experienced adult skaters who wish to improve their skating skills. Participation in the program will help promote physical fitness and improve balance and coordination while teaching proper skating techniques. Group instruction includes a 30 minute class and 30 minute supervised practice,

Beginner 2 (Alpha equivalent) & Adult Beginner 2

1. Forward Stroking

2. Forward Crossovers left over right (5)

3. Forward Crossovers right over left (5)

4. One foot snowplow stop

5. Two foot turn

 

Beginner 3 (Beta equivalent) & Adult Beginner 3

1. Backward Crossovers right over left (5)

2. Backward Crossovers left over right (5)

3. Backward Stroking (6)

4. Right T-Stop

5. Left T-Stop

6. Introduction to Forward Edges
